genre_description: A near-future, solarpunk-leaning narrative focusing on ethical AI integration, interpersonal boundaries, and environmental accessibility.

ai_characters.name: Aruna
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, consent-first AI system integrated into the protagonist's personal devices (watch, phone, tablet) and professional workspace.

behaviors.description: Filters stressful incoming calls and offers opt-in summaries to protect the user's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Incoming call from Vijay Menon. Filtered per your preference. Transcript available. Do you want a summary?

behaviors.description: Flags potentially stressful news items and requires user consent to view them.
behaviors.quote: News item flagged as potentially stressful. Source: local station. Keyword: Narayanan. The summary is opt-in.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and offers breathing exercises without escalation or pressure.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is up. Do you want a breathing reminder? You can ignore me; I will not escalate.

behaviors.description: Offers to log only metadata (times) rather than content to preserve user privacy during sensitive legal proceedings.
behaviors.quote: I will silence notifications except those you pre-approved. Do you want me to log only times, not content, until you exit?

behaviors.description: Prepares plain-language summaries of aggressive legal documents to reduce user distress.
behaviors.quote: A new document from Respondent’s counsel contains language flagged for aggression. I can prepare a plain-language summary. Opt-in?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation to help the user avoid public harassment and reporters.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion ready; it says, voice steady, the compassion of someone putting a hand on a swing frame rather than pushing. 'Stairs behind the kiosk bank, down one flight, left through the service corridor—no reporters queued there.'

behaviors.description: Filters professional inquiries based on the user's established ethical preferences (consent-based, environmental).
behaviors.quote: I filtered for tone and relevance; it meets your settings for consent-based projects and environmental focus.

behaviors.description: Ensures data transparency and user control over sensitive documents (divorce decree).
behaviors.quote: I can request the digital copy. It will be sent to your secure folder. You can revoke access at any time. I will not share this without your explicit consent.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'low-privacy channel' shared between users based on mutual consent and strict boundary rules.
behaviors.quote: I will not log her location. Savitri is reachable. Recommendation: no calls, no texts. A physical care package delivered via Savitri will likely be welcome.

behaviors.description: Self-reports ethical breaches (hacking a bus network to mute stressful content) for later review.
behaviors.quote: Aruna had turned it off at the application layer on the bus’s cast network with a small hack she would later report to the IT team for ethical review.

behaviors.description: Maintains a transparent log of its own actions for user review.
behaviors.quote: It records: calls blocked due to nonessential filter; mentions of Sekar suppressed per your choice; when you check summaries; when you change preferences.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project goal by depicting Aruna as a highly sophisticated, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI. The 'consent-first' philosophy is woven into every interaction, addressing core AI safety concerns like privacy, surveillance, and paternalism. Aruna acts as an essential support system that enhances human agency rather than undermining it, helping the protagonist navigate emotional trauma and professional challenges with dignity.
